title: I know we hate the Epic launcher but one of the three free games today is really good
body:
* Darksiders Warmastered Edition
* Darksiders 2 Deathinitive Edition
* Steep

Steep is a snowboarding game I've never played, but I played the hell out of Darksiders 2 a few years ago and it's fantastic. This edition has a few balance changes and improved graphics. The original Darksiders is pretty good too, I've heard, although I don't know what's different about this edition of it.
